class.name: Engine
class.description: The [code]Engine[/code] class allows you to query and modify the game's run-time parameters, such as frames per second, time scale, and others.

method.name: get_frames_drawn
method.description: Returns the total number of frames drawn.

method.name: get_frames_per_second
method.description: Returns the frames per second of the running game.

method.name: get_iterations_per_second
method.description: Returns the number of fixed iterations per second (for fixed process and physics).

method.name: get_main_loop
method.description: Returns the main loop object (see [MainLoop] and [SceneTree]).

method.name: get_target_fps
method.description: Returns the desired frames per second. If the hardware cannot keep up, this setting may not be respected. It defaults to 0, which indicates no limit.

method.name: get_time_scale
method.description: Returns how fast or slow the in-game clock ticks versus the real life one. It defaults to 1.0. A value of 2.0 means the game moves twice as fast as real life, whilst a value of 0.5 means the game moves at half the regular speed.

method.name: get_version_info
method.description:
Returns the current engine version information in a Dictionary.
"major" - Holds the major version number as a String "minor" - Holds the minor version number as a String "patch" - Holds the patch version number as a String "status" - Holds the status (e.g. "beta", "rc1", "rc2", ... "stable") as a String "revision" - Holds the revision (e.g. "custom-build") as a String "string" - major + minor + patch + status + revision in a single String

method.name: is_editor_hint
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the editor is running.

method.name: is_in_physics_frame
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the game is inside the fixed process and physics phase of the game loop.

method.name: set_editor_hint
method.description: Sets the running inside the editor hint if [code]enabled[/code] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_iterations_per_second
method.description: Sets the number of fixed iterations per second (for fixed process and physics).

method.name: set_target_fps
method.description: Sets the target frames per second.
